meanings.definition: Situated or occurring under the tongue.
meanings.sent1: The sublingual gland secretes saliva under the tongue.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the sublingual area is beneath the tongue.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally placed the sublingual thermometer in my ear instead of under my tongue!
meanings.sent4: Her sublingual piercing was a hidden gem beneath her tongue.
meanings.sent5: The sensation of the sublingual medication dissolving under my tongue was strange.

meanings.sent1: The nurse administered a sublingual tablet to the patient.
meanings.sent2: He always carries his sublingual medication in case of emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The sublingual pill tasted surprisingly sweet.
meanings.sent4: She felt the sublingual tablet work its magic almost instantly.
meanings.sent5: The sublingual medication provided quick relief for his headache.
